data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Analytics & Tracking Dashboard. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

requestBody.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents, create a biz representing The Referral Program System. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.title: Owner creates business tenant API Trace
